post:
What made LayerOnline different from other hosting providers? Rated as the Best Customer Service by independent hosting provider review site HostAdvice. At LayerOnline customers are always number 1. You will always get the best heroic customer service and customer experience you expect from a quality hosting provider.

High Performance Fully Customizable VPS Hosting

With VPS hosting from LayerOnline, You can choose between all popular Linux distros and Windows versions. You get fast response for your VPS with our latest Intel CPU, SSD storage and 1Gbps unlimited network bandiwdth. We offer DDOS protection, daily backup/snapshot, IPv6 and more. User coupon code "10OFF" for 10% off your orders.

Feature of LayerOnline VPS
  • Fully Customizable/Elastic
  • Blazing Fast Performance
  • Daily Backup/Snapshot
  • Windows (license not included)
  • 50+ Linux Distros
  • Unlimited Bandwidth
  • Unlimited Domains
  • Lightening Fast SSD VPS
  • Container Based 200+ One-Click Script Installer including WordPress, etc
  • IPv6 IP included
  • 1Gbps Network Port
  • DDOS Protection
  • rDNS
  • cPanel Managed $20

OpenVZ VPS Hosting

OpenVZ VPS is Linux OS only however it's lightweight and fast. LayerOnline's OpenVZ VPS offers unlimited bandwidth and is fully customizable from CPU, RAM, to SSD storage. You may upgrade/downgrade at anytime. Use coupon code "10OFF" for 10% off your orders.
